data.text: @Tormentooor Hi there, Due to the high amount of requests we receive at the moment we ask for your understanding that the response can take longer than usual. Please be assured that all requests are being answered. Kind regards, Chris

@PsychSchool Hi there, We ask for your understanding that due to the high volume of requests, it is not possible to process all of them within the usual time. Please be assured that all requests are being answered. Unfortunately, we cannot advise a specific time frame. Kind regards, Chris

@mdbergfeld Hello Mark,
thank you for reaching out to us. We're sorry to hear your bag has been delayed. 
You can contact us under this following address: vielzos@austrian.com.
Best regards
Alessandra
@FiferGreg Hi, I´ve answered already your private message. Best regards, Denis

@muziolog Hi Iryna, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. As already explained, the Social Media Team does not have any access to the baggage system. Please contact our responsible colleagues via centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @AlexliuIs Hi Alex, we are sincerely sorry for the stress and inconvenience this has caused you. Please send your feedback to my colleagues from Customer Relations via our online feedback form:https://t.co/dmK1I7JoWk They will then review your matter and get back to you. Best regards, Denis

@Tormentooor Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@SoleneGi Hi Solène, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@stxfn Hi Stefan, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. If you have not been rebooked in the meantime we kindly ask you to send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

@steph_whittaker Hi Stephanie, if you already sent the online form regarding any possible compensation we kindly ask you to send us the reference number of your claim (XXXX-OS-XXXXX) in a DM so we can investigate further. Kind regards, Chris

data.text:
@PsychSchool We are sincerely sorry for the stress and inconvenience this has caused you. Please send your feedback to my colleagues from Customer Relations via our online feedback form: https://t.co/dmK1I7JoWk They will then review your matter and get back to you. 
Best regards, Denis

@Henna_Kim1 Hi Henna, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

data.text:
@khalilhijal [2/2] Please mind due to the considerable amount of inquiries sent to us you may experience longer waiting times at the moment. Our colleagues are doing their best and will reply to your concern any time soon. Thank you for your understanding. 
Best regards, Shawn

@khalilhijal [1/2] Hi there, 
we are sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.
@iessekkat @baselhajar34 [1/2] Hi there, we are sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@iessekkat @baselhajar34 [2/2] Please contact the respective colleagues via the following email address: centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com
Thank you for your understanding.
Best regards, 
Shawn

@solenegi [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you can find all information about your case. The contact person will assist you. Best regards, Shawn

@solenegi [1/2] Hi there, 
we are sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@loetvveghel [2/2] Please mind that due to the considerable amount of inquiries sent to us you may experience longer waiting times at the moment. All of our colleagues are doing their best and will reply to your concern. Thank you for your understanding. 
Best regards, Shawn

@loetvveghel [1/2] Hi there, 
we do not offer any other form for your missing or delayed luggage claim - Please keep your reference number and contact our colleagues via the following email address: centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com -

@LoetvVeghel [3/3] We are doing our best and will reply to your concern as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding. 
Best regards, Shawn

@LoetvVeghel [2/3] As soon my colleagues have further info, they will get in touch with you regarding the transportation. Please mind that due to the considerable amount of inquiries sent to us you may experience longer waiting times at the moment.

@LoetvVeghel [1/3] Hi there, 
we are really sorry that you had to deal with all of this during your holiday. It is very important to have a reference number for your delayed or lost baggage claim. Please provide that info to my colleagues via the given contact in your PM.

@Synced_Human Hi, did our colleagues rebook you yet? If you missed the flight due to our delay then there is no charge, if it was due to a reason out of our control it will depend on the conditions of your ticket. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@norbertsteelez Hi, please send us a PM with the booking code and the issue and we will try to help.  Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@4lexl @viennaairport Hi Alex, unfortunately, we can't give you an estimate. My colleagues are doing their best to process each bag as quickly as possible to get it to its destination. Hence, I can only ask you for a little bit more patience. Best regards, Denis

@Synced_Human Hi there, please contact the service counter at the airport directly and our colleagues there will help you to get to your final destination with the next possible flight. Kind regards, Daphne

@lanerosen01 luggage, as only staff from the airport itself, have the authorization to be in the transit baggage area. They will send it to the final destination as soon as possible. We kindly ask for your patience. Kind regards, Daphne [2/2]

@lanerosen01 Hi there, we're sorry that they couldn't retrieve their luggage there. Be assured that our colleagues are doing their utmost to reunite the luggage with their owners, but if the bags are in transit, then it's not possible for the airline colleagues to get the [1/2]

@jibou94 Hi, you should have received a PIR-Number which will allow you to trace your baggage via the following link: https://t.co/macBQXzwy1
Best regards, Denis
@norbertsteelez Hi Norbert, please provide us with your booking reference or ticket number and we will take a closer look. Best regards, Denis

@4lexl @viennaairport Hi Alex, unfortunately, responses of Customer Relations are currently delayed due to the extraordinarily high volume of incoming inquiries. Handling times are much longer than usual. My apologies for the time waiting. Best regards, Denis

@iessekkat @ruba_h_ Hi, we are sorry for all the trouble caused. Unfortunately, we can't give you any updates on your submitted claim. We kindly ask you to contact the given contacts in your PIR. Lastly, you can email: centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com 
Best regards, Shawn

@gatoxxerran @drsoffee @onecent_ @ruba_h_ [1/2] Hi there,
Please mind that due to the considerable amount of inquiries sent to us you may experience longer waiting times at the moment. We are doing our best and will reply to your concern as soon as possible.

@gatoxxerran @drsoffee @onecent_ @ruba_h_ [2/2] On the other hand, you can send us your reference number via PM, so we can check your claim. Thank you for your understanding. 
Best regards, Shawn

@sty0pa Hi there, Please mind that due to the considerable amount of inquiries sent to us you may experience longer waiting times at the moment. We're doing our best and our colleagues will reply to your concern as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding. 
Best regards, Shawn
@AdlerEdwina @flyethiopian Hi there, I´ve answered already your private message. Best regards, Denis

@onecent_ Hi, we're sorry that you haven't received any answer yet. As our colleagues are handling all cases individually and due to the high amount of inquiries at the moment, you will experience a longer waiting time. We kindly ask for your patience. Kind regards, Daphne

@FaceShilla Hi, our colleagues will reply as soon as possible. As all cases are handled individually and due to the high amount of inquiries at the moment, you will experience a longer waiting time. But they will surely get back to you. We kindly ask for your patience. Kind regards, Daphne

@lanerosen01 Hi there, we are sincerely sorry for the stress and inconvenience this has caused your parents. I am sorry to hear about your delayed baggage. Have you filed a claim at the airport? I hope you will reunite with your baggage soon. Best regards, Denis

@Henna_Kim1 Hi Henna, we apologize for the delay with your luggage. Once your bag has arrived in Yerevan, our colleagues will be in touch. They are doing their best to process each bag as quickly as possible to get it to its destination. Best regards, Denis

data.text: @FaceShilla Hi there, you can send your inquiry for reimbursement via this online form via desktop version: https://t.co/DlPk2wk146 Kind regards, Daphne

@AndymacSyd Hi, we apologize for the delay to your luggage. Our colleagues are doing their best to process a backlog of bags. As soon as your bag has been located they will be in touch. We're sorry but the current situation means this is taking longer than normal. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@Ma_Sch3 Hi Marc, leider haben wir und unser Call Center keine Einsicht bei Gepäcksfällen. Bitte wende dich an den Kontakt, der auf dem PIR zu finden ist. Den Property Irregularity Report hast du am Lost&Found Schalter am Flughafen bekommen. Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay

@AnaisLaporte Hi Anais, unfortunately, the large number of inquiries means there are currently longer waiting times across all our channels. Please send us your request in a PM so that we can check if it is anything we can be of assistance with. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

urls.title: Austrian Airlines mid-year result: Back on course with full planes - Austrian Airlines

data.text:
4/4 In the first half of 2022, Austrian Airlines flew 4.2 million passengers, four times more compared to 2021 (1.1 mio). By June, short-time work was ended for all employees and the flag carrier started recruiting cabin crew members again in spring!
👉 https://t.co/mylh98LTMK

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

data.text: 3/4 Due to the weak 1st quarter & increase in kerosene expenditure, adjusted EBIT in the 1st half of the year remains still negative (-106 mio. €), but show a significant improvement compared to 2021 (-198 mio. €).

2/4 By the end of June, Austrian Airlines has repaid 30% of the state-backed loan. CEO Annette Mann: “Thanks to full summer flights, Austrian Airlines is on the rise again. However, the ongoing pandemic, increases in fuel costs & economic uncertainties continue to challenge us.”

data.text:
1/4 Back on course!
For the 1st time since the outbreak of the pandemic, Austrian Airlines reached a positive operating result of 2 mio. € in the 2nd quarter of 2022. In spite of many external challenges in the 1st half of 2022, 99% of all flights took off as scheduled. https://t.co/AZneTtZXwz

urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @Drdesimone Hi, we apologize for the delay to your luggage. Unfortunately, there are currently considerable delays in luggage processing. Claims for interim expenses can be submitted via the following link: https://t.co/gkxxiAghiq Kind regards, Lyndsay
@storm2407 [2/2]of our strict quality standards by our contractual partner.  Also the minimum connection time is determined by the airport. Thank you for your understanding. Kind regards, Funda

@storm2407 [1/2] Hi Philip, I am really sorry to learn about your inconveniences. Please mind that the off and onload process of the luggage is not handled by Austrian Airlines itself but from a contracted handling agent. So we are depending on a reliable way of work and the compliance

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @m_charalambous Hi Mikey, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. Please feel free to seek reimbursement by submitting a claim here: https://t.co/dAXMVijisj Kind regards, Chris

@PGorcine Hi there, We are sorry for any frustration caused by the length of time taken to solve your issue. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to claims submitted by you. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues for any revision requests. Kind regards, Chris

@ericudler Hi Eric, We apologize for any frustration caused by the length of time taken to solve your issue. If your baggage has still not been found we kindly ask you to send the following form via vielzos@austrian.com https://t.co/YvYTtEU6Jc Kind regards, Chris

@onecent_ Hi there, If you have sent your claim via our online form already our colleagues will get back to you as soon as possible. We kindly ask for your understanding that due to the current situation the response can take longer than usual. Kind regards, Chris
@miesmiesx Hi Michelle, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

@freelanceudit16 Hi Udit, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris
@Trewton Hi Trevor, you can find the correct number on your missing luggage report. We kindly ask for your understanding that we cannot offer any other number. Kind regards, Chris

@lunamasad Hi, We apologize one more time for any inconvenience. Unfortunately the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues for any potential queries or revision requests. Kind regards, Chris
@partalisarah @heathrowairport Hi Sarah, I've just replied to your other posting. Best regards, Denis

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@joostlek Hi there, please send your feedback to my colleagues from Customer Relations via our online feedback form: https://t.co/dmK1I7JoWk 
They will then review your matter and get back to you. Best regards, Denis

@lacapa128 Hi Yoshi, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Best regards, Denis

@DaisyDoesNails Hi Daisy, please apologize the inconvenience. There are many reasons why your bags could be delayed, for example, the tag may have come loose. We understand how frustrating this must be for you, and please be assured that we’ll do all possible to reunite asap. Best regards, Susi

@lunamasad Hi there, I am sorry to hear about your delayed baggage. Have you filed a claim at the airport? If yes, you should have received a PIR-Number which will allow you to trace your baggage online. I hope you will reunite with your baggage soon. 
Best regards, Denis

@LoetvVeghel Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Best regards, Denis
@miesmiesx Hi Michelle, the self-service kiosks and baggage drop-off devices are available for use from 04:00 a.m. Best regards, Denis

@selma_avdicevic Hi Selma, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris
@samanthawitch1 Hi Samantha, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoy your time with us. Kind regards, Chris
@Trewton Hi Trevor, If you are not able to contact our colleagues via phone you can send your request via viellos@austrian.com Kind regards, Chris

@HedijeCNF Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@carterkr Hi Kenneth, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris
@inknn Hi, wir entschuldigen uns vielmals für die entstandenen Unannehmlichkeiten und freuen uns zu hören, dass du deinen Koffer nun erhalten hast. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@burtonf22 Hi Rick, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris
